dict.acceptation: 出现，显现；出庭，出场；演出；发表；

sent.orig: Good! The second line of my couplet is: Floating-clouds appear,often appear,often appear and often go.
sent.trans: 琳：好句。我的下联是“漂浮的云出项了，经常出现，经常出现，又经常消失。”

sent.orig: The browning of Yali pear appear carpel at first, and then appear core and flesh.
sent.trans: 鸭梨果实褐变从心皮组织开始，逐步向果心、果肉扩展。

sent.orig: Finally, section 555(b) applies only to those compelled to appear, not those who appear voluntarily.
sent.trans: 最后，第五百五十五条第二款仅适用于那些被迫出庭者而非自愿出庭者。

sent.orig: Do get to 1900 metres level hypertension appear on retinue, hypertension appear altitude reaction meeting?
sent.trans: 到达海拔1900米左右出现高血压，高原反应会出现高血压吗？

sent.orig: From a distance they appear negligible; close up they are apt to appear ugly and malicious.
sent.trans: 从远处看他们显得微不足道，走到近处他们又显得丑恶、刻毒。
